item.text: The hand of the Lord was on me, and he brought me out by the Spirit of the Lord and placed me in the midst of the valley, and it was full of bones.

He made me <st data-num="05674" class="">walk</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">among</st> them.<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="02009" class="">realized</st><n id="2" /> there were a <st data-num="03966" class="">great</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> bones <st data-num="05921 06440">in</st> the <st data-num="01237" class="">valley</st>, and <st data-num="02009" class="">they were</st> <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="03002" class="">dry</st>.
He said to me, “Son of man, can these bones live?” I said to him, “Sovereign Lord, you know.”
Then he said to me, “Prophesy over these bones, and tell them: ‘Dry bones, listen to the Lord’s message.
This is what the Sovereign Lord says to these bones: Look, I am about to infuse breath into you and you will live.
I will put tendons on you and muscles over you and will cover you with skin; I will put breath in you, and you will live. Then you will know that I am the Lord.’”
So I prophesied as I was commanded. There was a sound when I prophesied— I heard a rattling, and the bones came together, bone to bone.
As I watched, I saw tendons on them, then muscles appeared, and skin covered over them from above, but there was no breath in them.

He said to me, “Prophesy to the breath—prophesy, son of man—and say to the breath: ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Come from the four winds, O breath, and breathe on these corpses so that they may live.’”
So I prophesied as I was commanded, and the breath came into them; they lived and stood on their feet, an extremely great army.
Then he said to me, “Son of man, these bones are all the house of Israel. Look, they are saying, ‘Our bones are dry, our hope has perished; we are cut off.’
Therefore prophesy, and tell them, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look, I am about to open your graves and will raise you from your graves, my people. I will bring you to the land of Israel.
Then you will know that I am the Lord, when I open your graves and raise you from your graves, my people.
I will place my breath in you and you will live; I will give you rest in your own land. Then you will know that I am the Lord—I have spoken and I will act, declares the Lord.’”
The Lord’s message came to me:

“As for <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">branch</st> and <st data-num="03789" class="">write</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> it, ‘For <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and for the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="02270" class="">associated</st> with him.’ Then <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">another</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">branch</st> and <st data-num="03789" class="">write</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> it, ‘For <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st>, the <st data-num="06086" class="">branch</st> of <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="02270" class="">associated</st> with him.’

<st data-num="07126 0259 0413 0259">Join</st><n id="1" /> them as <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">stick</st>;<n id="2" /> they will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> as <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> in your <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>.

<st data-num="0834" class="">When</st> your <st data-num="01121 05971">people</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559 0559">say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you, ‘Will you <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05046" class="">tell</st> us <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these things</st> mean?’

tell them, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look, I am about to take the branch of Joseph that is in the hand of Ephraim and the tribes of Israel associated with him, and I will place them on the stick of Judah and make them into one stick—they will be one in my hand.’

The <st data-num="06086 0834">sticks</st> you <st data-num="03789" class="">write</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> in your <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">in front of</st> them.

Then tell them, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look, I am about to take the Israelites from among the nations where they have gone. I will gather them from round about and bring them to their land.

I will <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> them <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nation</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, on the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> will <st data-num="01961 04428">rule</st> over them <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st>. They will <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">again</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> and <st data-num="03808 05750">never</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">again</st> be <st data-num="02673" class="">divided</st> into <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="04467" class="">kingdoms</st>.<n id="1" />

They will not defile themselves with their idols, their detestable things, and all their rebellious deeds. I will save them from all their unfaithfulness by which they sinned. I will purify them; they will become my people, and I will become their God.
“‘My servant David will be king over them; there will be one shepherd for all of them. They will follow my regulations and carefully observe my statutes.

They will <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="0776 0834">land</st> I <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> to my <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st>, in <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">fathers</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st>; they will <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> it—<st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> and their <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st> and their <st data-num="01121 01121">grandchildren</st> <st data-num="05704 05769">forever</st>. <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> my <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> will be <st data-num="05387" class="">prince</st> over them <st data-num="05769" class="">forever</st>.

I will <st data-num="03772" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> of <st data-num="07965" class="">peace</st> with them; it will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="05769" class="">perpetual</st> <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> them.<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="05414" class="">establish</st> them,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="07235" class="">increase</st> their <st data-num="07235" class="">numbers</st>, and <st data-num="05414" class="">place</st> my <st data-num="04720" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> them <st data-num="05769" class="">forever</st>.

My <st data-num="04908" class="">dwelling place</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> them; I will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> their <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>, and <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> my <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.
Then, when my sanctuary is among them forever, the nations will know that I, the Lord, sanctify Israel.’”
